data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Sevilla are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 1, Throw-in for Sevilla in their own half.
Juan Martinez Munuera signals a free kick to Sevilla.
Sevilla push upfield but Juan Martinez Munuera quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 4, Osasuna drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Osasuna's Ante Budimir gets in a shot on goal at Ramon Sanchez Pizjuan. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In Seville a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 7, Juan Martinez Munuera awards the away team a throw-in.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Sevilla awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 10, Osasuna awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball safe as Sevilla is awarded a throw-in in their half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Seville.
In the minute 12, Free kick for Sevilla in their own half.
In Seville, Sevilla push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Juan Martinez Munuera signals a free kick to Sevilla in their own half.
In the minute 14, Throw-in for Sevilla at Ramon Sanchez Pizjuan.
Ball goes out of play for a Osasuna goal kick.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Seville to check on Lucas Torro, who is grimacing with pain.
Throw-in Sevilla.
In the minute 16, Lucas Torro, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Oier is the substitute for Osasuna.
Sevilla's Youssef En-Nesyri misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 17, Osasuna have a goal kick.
Juan Martinez Munuera awards the away team a throw-in.
Can Sevilla get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Osasuna's half?
In the minute 19, Free kick for Osasuna in the half of Sevilla.
Enric Gallego (Osasuna) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Juan Martinez Munuera awards Sevilla a goal kick.
In the minute 21, Throw-in for Sevilla at Ramon Sanchez Pizjuan.
Sevilla have been awarded a corner by Juan Martinez Munuera.
Corner awarded to Sevilla.
In the minute 24, Ante Budimir (Osasuna) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Goal kick for Sevilla at Ramon Sanchez Pizjuan.
Free kick for Sevilla in their own half.
In the minute 25, Juan Martinez Munuera signals a free kick to Osasuna in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Osasuna goal kick.
Sevilla are coming forward and Lucas Ocampos gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 29, Goal kick for Osasuna at Ramon Sanchez Pizjuan.
Osasuna to take a throw-in in Sevilla territory.
Juan Martinez Munuera signals a Sevilla throw-in in Osasuna's half.
In the minute 32, Jesus Navas is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Throw-in for Sevilla in the half of Osasuna.
Sevilla pushes forward through Marcos Acuna, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 34, Juan Martinez Munuera signals a Sevilla throw-in in Osasuna's half.
Osasuna to take a throw-in in Sevilla territory.
Jony of Osasuna gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 35, It's a goal kick for the home team in Seville.
Jesus Navas is back on his feet again.
Sevilla awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 37, Sevilla surge into the attack at Ramon Sanchez Pizjuan but Joan Jordanâ€™s header is off-target.
Juan Martinez Munuera awards Osasuna a goal kick.
Sevilla awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 38, Sevilla are in shooting range from this free kick.
At Ramon Sanchez Pizjuan, Unai Garcia has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Osasuna needs to be cautious. Sevilla have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 40, Lucas Ocampos (Sevilla) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Ball safe as Sevilla is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Marcos Acuna.
Free kick for Sevilla in their own half.
In the minute 42, Sergio Escudero (Sevilla) has replaced the possibly injured Marcos Acuna at Ramon Sanchez Pizjuan.
Throw-in for Osasuna in their own half.
In the minute 43, Juan Martinez Munuera signals a free kick to Osasuna in their own half.
Free kick for Sevilla in their own half.
Sevilla awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 44, Juan Martinez Munuera signals a free kick to Osasuna in their own half.
Jon Moncayola for Osasuna drives towards goal at Ramon Sanchez Pizjuan. But the finish is unsuccessful.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 45, Osasuna have a goal kick.
Juan Martinez Munuera will wait an extra 2 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
Can Osasuna get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sevilla's half?
In the minute 45, Throw-in Sevilla.
Throw-in for Sevilla in their own half.
Sevilla awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over at Ramon Sanchez Pizjuan.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
The home team replace Jesus Navas with Ivan Rakitic.
In the minute 47, Osasuna awarded a free kick in their own half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Osasuna close to the penalty box.
The match at Ramon Sanchez Pizjuan has been interrupted briefly for a check on Enric Gallego, who is down injured.
In the minute 50, Osasuna are pushing forward but Ruben Garcia's finish is wide of the goal.
Sevilla have a goal kick.
Can Sevilla capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Osasuna's half?
In the minute 51, Osasuna's Enric Gallego is back in action after a slight knock.
Throw-in Osasuna.
Free kick for Osasuna in their own half.
In the minute 52, Free kick Sevilla.
Sevilla have been awarded a corner by Juan Martinez Munuera.
Throw-in for Osasuna in the half of Sevilla.
In the minute 55, Osasuna awarded a free kick in their own half.
Juan Martinez Munuera awards the home team a throw-in.
Sevilla have been given a penalty at Ramon Sanchez Pizjuan...
In the minute 57, Juan Martinez Munuera awards Sevilla a penalty but Lucas Ocampos misses from 12 yards.
Lucas Ocampos gets his shot on target but fails to score for Sevilla.
Goal! Lucas Ocampos gives Sevilla a 1-0 lead from the penalty spot.
In the minute 61, Throw-in for Sevilla close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Osasuna at Ramon Sanchez Pizjuan.
Juan Martinez Munuera signals a free kick to Osasuna in their own half.
In the minute 64, Ball safe as Sevilla is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Sevilla's Ivan Rakitic misses with an attempt on goal.
Juan Martinez Munuera awards Osasuna a goal kick.
In the minute 65, It's a goal kick for the home team in Seville.
Sevilla's Sergio Escudero gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Osasuna goal kick.
In the minute 67, Jagoba Arrasate (Osasuna) is making a second substitution, with Roberto Torres replacing Ruben Garcia.
Osasuna make their third substitution with Nacho Vidal replacing Unai Garcia.
Can Sevilla get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Osasuna's half?
In the minute 68, Sevilla to take a throw-in in Osasuna territory.
Luuk De Jong is on a sub for Carlos Fernandez for Sevilla.
Juan Martinez Munuera signals a free kick to Osasuna in their own half.
In the minute 70, Goal kick for Sevilla at Ramon Sanchez Pizjuan.
Juan Martinez Munuera awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in high up the field for Osasuna in Seville.
In the minute 73, Free kick for Osasuna in their own half.
At Ramon Sanchez Pizjuan, Osasuna are penalized for being offside.
Juan Martinez Munuera signals a throw-in for Osasuna, close to Sevilla's area.
In the minute 75, Sevilla awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sevilla awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick Osasuna.
In the minute 77, Ivan Rakitic (Sevilla) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Free kick for Sevilla in their own half.
Sevilla awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 79, Juan Martinez Munuera signals a free kick to Sevilla.
Throw-in for Sevilla in the half of Osasuna.
Oier (Osasuna) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 81, Throw-in for Osasuna at Ramon Sanchez Pizjuan.
Goal kick for Sevilla at Ramon Sanchez Pizjuan.
Juan Martinez Munuera awards Sevilla a goal kick.
The away team replace Juan Cruz with Inigo Perez.
In the minute 83, Jagoba Arrasate is making the team's fifth substitution at Ramon Sanchez Pizjuan with Adrian Lopez replacing Enric Gallego.
Sevilla advance rapidly upfield but Juan Martinez Munuera blows for offside.
In the minute 85, Osasuna attack but Ante Budimir's header doesn't find the target.
Sevilla have a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 87, In Seville a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Fernando (Sevilla) has received a yellow card from Juan Martinez Munuera.
In the minute 88, Juan Martinez Munuera signals a free kick to Sevilla in their own half.
The home team have replaced Joan Jordan with Nemanja Gudelj. This is the fourth substitution made today by Julen Lopetegui.
Franco Vazquez is on a sub for Youssef En-Nesyri for Sevilla.
Free kick for Sevilla in the half of Osasuna.
Ball goes out of play for a Osasuna goal kick.
In Seville a free kick has been awarded the home team.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Seville.
The fourth official's board shows 3 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Juan Martinez Munuera signals a Osasuna throw-in in Sevilla's half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Osasuna have a dangerous throw-in.
Ball safe as Sevilla is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 1-0.
Osasuna's David Garcia has been booked in Seville.
